profileText: a Representative from Florida; born in Tucson, Pima County, Ariz., April 20, 1974; United States Capitol Page School, 1990-1991; A.B., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 1996; M.B.A., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 1998; business executive; member of the Florida state house of representatives, 2016-2024; member of the Florida state senate, 2024-2025; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress, by special election, to fill the vacancy caused by the resignation of United States Representative Michael Waltz (April 1, 2025-present).
